info.description: Reusable location rules for shipping zones (stored as text, parsed by backend).

countries.description: Country codes. Use comma or new lines (e.g. US,CA,IN).

states.description: State/province codes or names. Use comma or new lines.

postal_codes.description: Postal code patterns/ranges. One per line. Supports wildcards (123*) and ranges (1000-2000).
